sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { View, StyleSheet, Image, Text, Button, TouchableOpacity } from 'react-native'

export default function BroadcastForm() {
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>

            <Image style={styles.img} source={require('E:/Upwork/React Native/AwesomeProject/assets/frame.png')} />

            <Text style={styles.text}>
                This message is going to be broadcasted out!
            </Text>
            <TouchableOpacity>
                <Text style={styles.button}>
                    Just do it!
                </Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>

            <TouchableOpacity>
                <Text style={styles.back}>
                    Back
                </Text>
            </TouchableOpacity>
            {/* <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'flex-start' }}>
                <View>
                    <Image style={styles.photo} source={require('E:/Upwork/React Native/AwesomeProject/assets/photo.png')} />
                    <Image style={styles.badge} source={require('E:/Upwork/React Native/AwesomeProject/assets/badge.png')} />
                </View>
                <Text style={styles.username}>Hengzhi Huang</Text>
            </View>

            <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'flex-end' }}>
                <View style={styles.rect}>
                    <Image style={styles.icon} source={require('E:/Upwork/React Native/AwesomeProject/assets/email.png')} />
                </View>
            </View> */}
        </View>
    )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        borderRadius: 30,
        paddingLeft: -21,
        paddingRight: -21,
        // Left: 21,
        backgroundColor: '#212027'
    },

    img: {
        width: 179.97,
        height: 158.58,
        marginTop: 88,
        marginLeft: 115,
        marginRight: 93.68,
        marginBottom:28.62,
    },

    text: {
        width: 306,
        marginLeft: 42,
        alignSelf: 'center',
        // alignItems: 'stretch',
        fontWeight: 500,
        fontSize: 20,
        lineHeight: 26,
        alignContent: 'center',
        color: '#FFFFFF',
        marginBottom: 33,
    },

    button: {
        backgroundColor: '#FF7C24',
        borderRadius: 12,
        paddingBottom: 19,
        paddingTop: 18,
        marginBottom: 12,
        fontSize: 18,
        fontWeight: 600,
        color: '#FFFFFF',
        textAlign: 'center',
    },

    back_button: {
        fontSize: 18,
        color: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.35)',
        textAlign: 'center',
    }
})
